short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal AI assistant. Scheduling management add-on (beta)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chronify is your personal AI assistant, helping you manage scheduling in a way that is most personalized to you. Assistant considers your working hours, preferences for breaks and task-slit, and automatically puts everything in your calendar.

This extension creates an elegant sidebar in Google CalendarÂ® for you to interact with the assistant.

Currently in beta.
